text:
#MalariaDrug, Chloroquine->Quinine.
Take note:
The Malaria regions that for decades have been saturated with #Chloroquine->#Quinine are virtually #CoronaVirus Free.
In these areas people drink Tonic water because it contains Quinine.
Malaria almost killed me, Quinine saved me. https://t.co/iXN6qld8ns
